statements: SELECT * FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE tenant_id = 123;
SELECT tenant_id, property_id, payment_due_date FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE payment_due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT tenant_id, property_id FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE last_payment_date IS NULL;
SELECT tenant_id, reminder_message FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE reminder_message LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT * FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE tenant_id = 456 ORDER BY payment_due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE tenant_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY payment_due_date DESC
SELECT tenant_id, COUNT(property_id) AS property_count FROM rent_payment_reminders GROUP BY tenant_id HAVING COUNT(property_id) > 1
SELECT tenant_id, payment_due_date, DATE_ADD(payment_due_date, INTERVAL 7 DAY) AS payment_due_date_plus_7 FROM rent_payment_reminders
SELECT * FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE reminder_message LIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY tenant_id ASC, property_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT tenant_id, COUNT(property_id) AS property_count FROM rent_payment_reminders GROUP BY tenant_id ORDER BY property_count DESC, tenant_id ASC
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT address, property_id, rent_due_date FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_id, address FROM rental_properties WHERE rent_due_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT rent_due_date, address FROM rental_properties ORDER BY rent_due_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, COUNT(reminder_id) AS reminder_count FROM rent_payment_reminders GROUP BY property_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE rent_due_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT property_id, address FROM rental_properties WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND rent_due_date < '2023-05-01';

SELECT rental_properties.address, rent_payment_reminders.reminder_date FROM rental_properties JOIN rent_payment_reminders ON rental_properties.property_id = rent_payment_reminders.property_id WHERE reminder_date > '2023-06-01' ORDER BY rental_properties.address;
SELECT DISTINCT property_id, rent_due_date FROM rental_properties WHERE rent_due_date BETWEEN '2023-04-01' AND '2023-06-30' ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties, MIN(rent_due_date) AS earliest_due_date, MAX(rent_due_date) AS latest_due_date FROM rental_properties;
SELECT * FROM rent_payment_reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM rent_payment_reminders;
SELECT tenant_id, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM rent_payment_reminders ORDER BY tenant_id DESC;
SELECT notification_id, tenant_id, property_id, payment_date FROM payment_notifications WHERE tenant_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM rent_transactions WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rent_payment_reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, tenant_id, reminder_date FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE tenant_id = 101;
SELECT count(*) AS total_reminders FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE reminder_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_notifications WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT tenant_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM rent_transactions GROUP BY tenant_id ORDER BY total_payment DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT full_name, email FROM property_owners ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM properties GROUP BY owner_id;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM rent_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_sent FROM payment_reminders WHERE reminder_sent = FALSE ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM property_owners;
SELECT address, p.full_name FROM properties p JOIN property_owners po ON p.owner_id = po.owner_id;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM rent_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT p.address, pr.payment_amount FROM properties p JOIN rent_payments pr ON p.property_id = pr.property_id;
SELECT pr.reminder_id, pr.reminder_date, pr.reminder_sent FROM payment_reminders pr WHERE pr.reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Payment_Reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, message FROM Payment_Reminders WHERE reminder_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Tenants ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT address, num_units FROM Properties WHERE landlord_id = 101 ORDER BY num_units DESC;
SELECT reminder_id, status FROM Reminders_Log WHERE notification_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payment_Reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, message FROM Payment_Reminders WHERE tenant_id = 2;
SELECT Properties.property_id, Properties.address, Tenants.name FROM Properties JOIN Tenants ON Properties.landlord_id = Tenants.tenant_id;
SELECT * FROM Landlords WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT reminder_date, message FROM Payment_Reminders ORDER BY reminder_id DESC;
